title: "New outlook says semiconductor chip shortage will cost auto industry $210B"
excerpt: "The global semiconductor chip shortage will cost the automotive industry $210 billion in revenue this year, nearly twice the cost projected just a few months ago, consulting firm AlixPartners said Thursday."
